job_tasks.phrase: Redesign and optimize our Kafka streaming components to reduce latency, increase throughput, and increase event consumption rate.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes optimizing existing components for performance and efficiency, which falls under the operational aspects of maintaining and improving systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Upgrading/Developing new components of a multilayered application to enable near real-time data processing.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the development of new application components, a core software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitor, maintain and debug all components daily to ensure stability and consistency.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions monitoring, maintenance, and debugging, which are key responsibilities in operations engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: reduce latency, increase throughput, and increase event consumption rate

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software engineering and operations tasks, particularly involving Kafka streaming. There is no mention of AI, machine learning, or generative models, which are central to the GenAI Engineer and ML Engineer profiles.
